name: Lavender Calm
shortDescription: Soothing French lavender with a hint of vanilla.
description: Indulge in the peaceful aroma of our Lavender Calm candle. Hand-poured with premium soy wax and infused with high-quality French lavender essential oils, this candle is perfect for winding down after a long day. The subtle hint of vanilla adds a touch of sweetness to the floral notes.

name: Midnight Forest
shortDescription: Deep pine, cedarwood, and a touch of crisp night air.
description: Transport yourself to a moonlit woodland with Midnight Forest. This earthy scent combines robust pine and cedarwood with a refreshing cool breeze finish. Ideal for creating a cozy, grounded atmosphere in your home.

name: Citrus Sunshine
shortDescription: Bright bergamot, lemon zest, and sweet orange.
description: Energize your space with the vibrant Citrus Sunshine. A zesty blend of Italian bergamot, fresh lemon peel, and sun-ripened oranges. This candle is designed to uplift your mood and bring a burst of light into any room.

name: Vanilla Chai
shortDescription: Warm cinnamon, spicy cardamom, and creamy vanilla.
description: A comforting embrace of classic chai spices. Vanilla Chai blends warm cinnamon sticks, crushed cardamom pods, and a base of smooth, creamy vanilla bean. Perfect for cold evenings and cozy reading sessions.

name: Ocean Breeze
shortDescription: Sea salt, driftwood, and fresh coastal air.
description: Bring the serenity of the shoreline indoors. Ocean Breeze captures the essence of a morning walk on the beach, with notes of salty spray, weathered driftwood, and a clean, aquatic finish.
